name: Shell Turbo Revive

globalDocs.name: Shell Turbo Revive EN TDG V1.1 28-Oct-2020

localDocs.name: Shell Turbo Revive United States EN 140002686046 EHS V2.0 04-JUN-2021

marketing:
Shell Turbo Revive is a synthetic based solvency enhancer, that can be incorporated into hydrocarbon-based turbine fluids to reduce the issues associated with varnish formation and product instability. Shell Turbo Revive is designed improve the solubility of pre-existing hydrocarbon-based turbine fluid in order to repair those fluids with elevated and high varnish potential ratings. 
Shell Turbo Revive does not replenish the existing anti-oxidants in used turbine fluids but rather helps re-activate the additives that are trapped in varnish deposits by bringing them back into solution.
